Date: Monday, 6/9/1989
Subject: Progress of Jack Snow
Dear Sir,
Jack Snow is hitting the ball well at A Tampa White Sox!
He has an AVG of .306, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

I believe he is ready for the next level!
